message.body: Hey did u get the French horn part made for brazil? I can send a copy to you. Just let me know. Thanks
Not yet, can i come pick up the full score today or tomorrow? The orchestration really depends on having all the parts covered so i may need to adjust a lot
Sure. Tomorrow I will be at school until 330. I can also send it to your school mail box?
Ill stop by and say hi
Awesome! I'd love to see you
